name: json-to-go
description: Convert JSON data to Go struct

json-to-go.inlineTypeDefinitions.description: If turned on nested structs are defined in-line, else below the main struct

json-to-go.contextMenu.supportedLanguage.description: Editor languages inside which right mouse context menu entry is shown. Include "*" for all languages.

json-to-go.input.description: Source of JSON data to convert. Can be either clipboard or selection in active editor
enumDescriptions: JSON data is copied from clipboard and converted
JSON data is copied from active editor selection and converted
User is asked every time to select source of JSON data

json-to-go.output.description: Destination of struct definition string. Can be either clipboard, inserted after cursor position in active editor or temporary file
enumDescriptions: Outputs struct after cursor position in active editor
Opens temporary file with struct definition and selects name of the struct
User is asked every time to select destination of struct definition
